content.title: National Handicrafts Development Programme: Infrastructure And Technology Support: EMPORIA
content.details: The scheme 'Infrastructure and Technology Support: EMPORIA' is a Component/Sub-Scheme under the Umbrella Scheme 'National Handicrafts Development Programme'. Under this component, assistance would be provided for the setting up of emporia. These would be set up in commercially viable locations in the implementing agencies' own/rented buildings. The basic objective of the component is to provide a marketing platform to the Local Handicrafts Artisans in their respective area through the outlet and emporia.
benefits: Financial Assistance for new emporia (₹ 60,00,000 per unit)
Financial Assistance for strengthening/renovation (₹ 15,00,000 per unit)
80% of admissible amount borne by the O/o the DC (H)
100% assistance for strengthening/renovation of existing emporia
eligibility: Central/State Handloom and Handicrafts Development Corporations
Eligible Non-Governmental Organizations, Registered SHGs, local statutory bodies
Producer companies registered under Section 8 of the Companies Act
Any component can be implemented by the department
documents_required: Recommendation letter of Field office/Regional Office
Three years Balance Sheet & audited statement of accounts
Affidavit in respect of Non-Corrupt Practice and validity of Registration
Land ownership document/ Lease agreement for the proposed project/Detailed Project Report
Feasibility report of the project certified by a scheduled commercial bank
Construction plan and cost estimate authenticated by Architect/ Chartered Engineer
Undertaking that balance of the total cost to be borne by the implementing agency
Any other documents mentioned in Proforma/ desired by the competent authority

faqs.question: What Is The Full Form Of NHDP?
faqs.answer: The Full Form of NHDP is 'National Handicrafts Development Programme'.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The basic objective of the component is to provide a marketing platform to the Local Handicrafts Artisans in their respective area through the outlet and emporia.

faqs.question: At What Locations Shall The EMPORIA Be Set Up?
faqs.answer: These would be set up in commercially viable locations in the implementing agencies' own/rented buildings.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Online Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme accepts offline applications.
